creator: Firdous Fatima
descriptionHtml:
Rubama (رُبَمَا) Quran Para 14(Juz 14) Offline Without Internet.
It is Para 14 of the Holy Quran (Qur'an) 9 Lines Black / Color Coded Tajweed.

The Holy Quran is a compilation of the verbal revelations given to the Prophet Muhammad over a period of 23 years. The Holy Quran is the Holy Book of the Muslims. It lays down for them the law and commandments, codes for their social and moral behavior, and contains a comprehensive religious philosophy. Its language is Arabic.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: a text bug fixed. 64 bit support added.

title: Color coded Para 14 - Juz' 14 with Sound

creator: Firdous Fatima
descriptionHtml:
App contains Quran Para 14(Juz 14) with Sound of the Holy Quran (Qur'an) 9 Lines Black / Color Coded Tajweed.

Get all 30 para links at https://learnnooraniqaida.com/islamic-apps/

Check my YouTube channel at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRlbzUcItQUn9VPw9GLWYeQ

Quran Para 14, (also called Juz 14) contains two surahs. It starts at Ayah 1 of Surah Al-Hijr and continues to Surah An-Nahl Ayah 128.

In this section of the Quran, the focus of Surah Hijr is about divine guidance. Allah warns the people as in the story of Prophet Lut and the people of Thamud.
descriptionShort: It is color coded Para 14 - Juz' 14 with Audio.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: an issue fixed. app is offline now.
